<!-- Thin announcement strip (sticks under navbar) -->
<div class="ann-strip" role="status" aria-live="polite">
  <div class="ann-inner">
    <span class="ann-dot" aria-hidden="true"></span>
    <span class="ann-text">News page is coming soon!</span>
    <a class="ann-link" href="news.html">Preview Page →</a>
  </div>
  <button class="ann-toggle" aria-label="Collapse announcement" title="Collapse">▾</button>
</div>

<!-- Reopen tab (appears when collapsed) -->

<style>
/* ===== thin strip ===== */
.ann-strip{
  /* 放在导航栏正下方：把这一块紧贴导航，无额外大间距 */
  margin: 6px 0 14px;
  padding: .38rem .75rem;
  display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:center; gap:.8rem;
  background:#f7faff;
  border-bottom:1px solid #e6eefc;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 0 rgba(13,110,253,.04);
  color:#0b2e66;
  font:500 .95rem/1.25 system-ui,-apple-system,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",Arial,sans-serif;
  overflow:hidden;              /* 为动画裁剪 */
  max-height: 44px;             /* 展开高度 */
  transition: max-height .28s ease, opacity .28s ease;
  opacity:1;
  position:relative;
  z-index: 5;
}
.ann-inner{display:flex; align-items:center; gap:.6rem;}
.ann-dot{width:.5rem;height:.5rem;border-radius:50%;background:#0d6efd;box-shadow:0 0 0 4px rgba(13,110,253,.12)}
.ann-link{font-weight:600;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:1px dashed #7aa4ff}
.ann-link:hover{border-bottom-color:transparent}

/* 收起时的样式（通过 JS 加 .is-collapsed） */
.ann-strip.is-collapsed{max-height:0; opacity:0; border-bottom-color:transparent; margin-bottom:0}

/* 右侧收缩按钮（小三角） */
.ann-toggle{
  position:absolute; right:10px; top:50%; transform:translateY(-50%);
  border:0; background:transparent; cursor:pointer;
  font-size:1rem; line-height:1; color:#5c728a; opacity:.7;
}
.ann-toggle:hover{opacity:1}

/* 重新打开的小标签（贴近右上角，和导航接近） */
.ann-tab{
  position: sticky; top: 8px; /* 导航栏下方“钉住” */
  margin-left: auto; float: right;
  padding:.3rem .55rem; border-radius:999px; border:1px solid #e0e8ff;
  background:#f6f9ff; color:#0b2e66;
  font:600 .88rem/1 system-ui,-apple-system,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",Arial,sans-serif;
  box-shadow:0 6px 18px rgba(13,110,253,.12);
}
.ann-tab:hover{background:#ffffff}

/* 暗色自适配（可选） */
@media (prefers-color-scheme: dark){
  .ann-strip{background:#0f2340;border-bottom-color:#213a66;color:#d7e6ff;box-shadow:none}
  .ann-link{border-bottom-color:#5b86ff}
  .ann-toggle{color:#b8c9ff}
  .ann-tab{background:#0f2340;color:#d7e6ff;border-color:#2b4875}
}

/* 小屏收紧 */
@media (max-width:640px){
  .ann-strip{padding:.32rem .6rem; gap:.6rem}
  .ann-inner{gap:.5rem}
}
</style>

<script>
(function(){
  const KEY='ann_strip_collapsed_v1'; // 记忆是否收起
  const strip = document.querySelector('.ann-strip');
  const toggleBtn = strip.querySelector('.ann-toggle');
  const tab = document.querySelector('.ann-tab');

  function collapse(persist=true){
    strip.classList.add('is-collapsed');
    tab.hidden = false;
    persist && localStorage.setItem(KEY,'1');
  }
  function expand(persist=true){
    strip.classList.remove('is-collapsed');
    tab.hidden = true;
    persist && localStorage.setItem(KEY,'0');
  }

  // 初始状态（支持 ?showAnn=1 强制展开）
  const forceShow = new URLSearchParams(location.search).get('showAnn')==='1';
  const saved = localStorage.getItem(KEY);
  if (forceShow || saved !== '1'){ expand(false); } else { collapse(false); }

  // 按钮交互
  toggleBtn.addEventListener('click', ()=> collapse(true));
  tab.addEventListener('click', ()=> expand(true));
})();
</script>
